channels_info.title: Incapelis.com

Sala 1 $doregex[makelist]
makelist
<title>[makelist.param3]</title> <link>$doregex[link2]</link> <regex> <name>link2</name> <expres>file:'(.*)'</expres> <page>http://streamin.to/embed-$doregex[link]-740x360.html</page> <referer>http://streamin.to</referer> </regex> <regex> <name>link</name> <expres>http://streamin.to/embed-(.*?)-</expres> <page>[makelist.param4]</page> <referer>http://catoalkodi.info</referer> </regex> <thumbnail>[makelist.param1]</thumbnail> <fanart>[makelist.param1]</fanart> <info>[makelist.param2]</info>
src="(.*?)"[\w\W\s]{0,2}title="(.*?)"[\w\W\s]{0,2}alt="(.*?)"[\w\W\s]{0,45}href="(.*?)" http://www.inkapelis.com/genero/accion/page/1/
